channel.title: Has anyone tried a Mellotron patch?
channel.description: Has anyone tried to create a Mellotron patch? You'd need the original samples on an SDcard and then link each key to the appropriate sample, I guess?

item.title: Has anyone tried a Mellotron patch?
item.dc:creator: @janvantomme Jan Vantomme
item.description:
@janvantomme wrote:

I've played around with sample players and dynamic filenames a while ago. It's the only way to link each key to a different sample, since there is no way to have lots of sample players.

Dynamic filenames

I've been working on a similar patch last week. This one switches between 4 sample players so you can play samples on top of each other when the notes don't start at the same time. Still looking for a polyphonic solution to create sample-based drum machines where notes can start at the same time. samplebank2.axp (8.4 KB) [image]

Read full topic
item.source: Has anyone tried a Mellotron patch?
